item.title: 1 Introduction to Programming Languages and Tools of the Trade
item.description: Vscode extensions for web development ESLint Integrates ESLint JavaScript into VS Code. Prettier JS code formatter JavaScript (ES6) code snippets Tools Node.JS (NodeJS安装-菜鸟教程)[https://www.runoob.com/nodejs/nodejs-install-setup.html]

item.title: 2 Introduction to GitHub
item.description: 基本命令 创建虚拟环境：conda create -n <env_name> python=X.X 激活虚拟环境：conda activate <env_name> Minutiae unable auto activate base: conda config --set auto_activate_base false
